text: aur khuda hee kee ibaadat karo aur kisee ko usaka shareek na banao aur mo baap aur qaraabatadaaron aur yateemon aur mohataajon aur rishtedaar padosiyon aur ajanabee padosiyon aur pahaloo mein baithane vaale musaahibon aur padosiyon aur zar khareed laundee aur gulaam ke saath ehasaan karo beshak khuda akad ke chalane vaalon aur shekheebaazon ko dost nahin rakhata
